actions.name: YOU
actions.value: Oh venerable tree, guardian of the mystical forest, I beseech thee.

actions.name: TREE
actions.value: State your name and your purpose.

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: I’m [Name]. I come seeking a spell. I was told by the elders that I could come to you.

actions.name: TREE
actions.value: What sort of spell do you seek?

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: A chance to turn back time. To mend the broken and… recover what was lost.

actions.name: TREE
actions.value: Your quest is intriguing, little one. But the threads of time are fragile. To alter the past is a task of great consequence.

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: Please. I want to know what happened to my friend… My dear Eloise.

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: The elders have been telling me that it’s because she’s ungrateful to the gods, that she’s weak and she doesn’t work hard enough… They say I shouldn’t be like her.

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: But I want to know what really happened.

actions.name: TREE
actions.value: Very well. I will give you the chance to go back into <u>three different moments</u> in time. How you change the outcome will be up to you.

actions.name: TREE
actions.value: But remember that the choices you make come with consequences.

actions.value: To understand one’s heart, you must choose kindly.

actions.value: I messed it up… I mess it up every time. I can’t do anything right…

actions.name: ELOISE
actions.value: Do you mean it?

actions.value: Of course! You’re my best friend. Let’s do it one step at a time.

actions.name: YOU

actions.name: YOU

Forest
[Name], you really shouldn’t be hanging out with Eloise.
There’s a reason the elders say she’s cursed, you know. She might be dangerous.
Eloise_Anxious

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: Just a little further, Eloise!

actions.name: ELOISE
actions.value: What is it that we were looking for?

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: The magic tree! It’s said to grant any of our wishes.

actions.name: ELOISE
actions.value: What were you going to wish for?

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: I wanted to ask why people were treating you so badly. Everyone keeps telling me you’re cursed.

actions.name: ELOISE
actions.value: …Do you believe them?

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: No. I don’t know why they’re saying what they’re saying, but Eloise, I know you.

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: What’s been going on?

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: …I’m not sure. People keep telling me to stay away from you, you know?

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: Sometimes I wonder if you really are cursed.

actions.name: ELOISE
actions.value: I have something to tell you…

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: What is it?

actions.name: ELOISE
actions.value: The truth is… I’ve been losing my magic. That’s why everyone’s been telling me I’m cursed.

actions.name: ELOISE
actions.value: The elders keep telling me I should leave the village because I’m setting a bad example to the other kids… they say I’m like this because I’m not working hard enough.

actions.name: ELOISE
actions.value: Because I’m weak or I’m being punished by the gods. But I don’t really know why this is happening to me…
